experience.title: Investment Team
experience.description: Titan Capital is an early stage, sector agnostic startup investment office of Kunal Bahl and Rohit Bansal. Our portfolio comprises of 250+ companies, including notable investments like Mamaearth, Urban Company, Ofbusiness, Razorpay, Ola, Shadofax, and many more. If you're a founder seeking Idea/ Pre-seed/ Seed funding, drop me at jai[at]titancapital[dot]vc
